channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘It feels like retaliation’: My sister is estranged from her daughter and wants to donate her inheritance. Is that weird?
item.description: “There is a new cultural trend of adult children becoming estranged from their parents.”

item.title: Dow Gains; U.S. Steel Stock Drops
item.description: U.S. stocks moved higher and were on course to break dayslong losing streaks, lifted by tech and chip and energy shares.

item.title: Today’s newborns may need $5 million or more for retirement starting in 2100
item.description: Generation Beta could face a major shortfall in savings in 75 years if things don’t change.

item.title: Ford, Rivian stocks get boost from sales after rival Tesla’s numbers fall short
item.description: Rivian and Ford shares are on the rise after both carmakers touted growth in EV sales.

item.title: Stocks will struggle under Trump if this rate keeps going higher
item.description: U.S. debt concerns and higher Treasury yields may be stumbling blocks for stocks in 2025.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on the U.S. housing market, Partners Group and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Extends Losses on Below-Estimate Storage Draw
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures extended their losses after a draw on inventories was less than forecast.

item.title: China Must Heed Lessons of Japan's Lost Decades
item.description: With China facing a deflationary spiral and uncertain economic prospects, lower interest rates alone wouldn’t be enough to kick the economy back into ...

item.title: House speaker election: Betting markets give Mike Johnson strong chance of getting job after setbacks in 1st vote
item.description: An initial round of voting in the U.S. House of Representatives looked like it wouldn’t deliver a speaker on Friday, as Louisiana Republican Mike John...

item.title: Gold Settles Lower, Silver Rises
item.description: Gold settled down 0.5% Friday, while silver rose 0.6%. For the week, both metals posted gains.
